Lot premiums are as follows:
  • Lot 107: $110,000
  • Lot 106: $80,000
  • Lot 105: $80,000
Deposit Structure:
  • $5,000 with the oﬀer
  • $20,000 when ﬁrm (15 days after the accepted oﬀer)

A Design fee of $2,000 is non-refundable and is not credited towards the purchase price on closing. This fee holds your lot and pays for part of the designer/architects time.
